title: DevFest Montreal 2025
subTitle: By Google Developer Group Montreal

longDescription:
**Join the largest gathering of developers in the province of Quebec!**

Google Developer Groups (GDGs) are global communities of developers who share their knowledge and passion for Google's technologies. DevFest Montreal is your opportunity to connect with the vibrant Montreal tech ecosystem and learn from industry leaders.

Co-hosted by GDG Montreal, GDG Cloud Montreal, GDG on Campus (McGill, Concordia, UdeM), Flutter Montreal, and WTM Montreal, this full-day event brings together Google Developer Experts (GDEs), Googlers, and top-tier local and international speakers.

Immerse yourself in multiple tracks covering Android, Flutter, Cloud, AI, and ML. From inspiring keynotes to hands-on workshops, you'll gain valuable insights and practical skills. Network with fellow developers, share your expertise and discover new opportunities.

Don't miss this chance to be part of Montreal's thriving tech community and connect with like-minded individuals!
